greeting.title: Welcome!
greeting.text: Welcome to the unique region of the Danube Delta, which will surprise you with a variety of landscapes: from wetlands, small rivers, the Danube lakes, to picturesque steppe areas. We will show you the rich flora and fauna of the region, preserved and restored nature, as well as large herbivores in the wild, which we return to the lands where they once lived. Visit the natural parks of the delta!
